mapper.select: SELECT l.* FROM location l JOIN hotplace h ON l.locationId = h.locationId WHERE h.userId = #{userId}

SELECT CAST(sub.hits AS CHAR) AS hits, CAST(loc.locationId AS CHAR) AS locationId, CAST(loc.title AS CHAR) AS title, CAST(loc.addr1 AS CHAR) AS addr1, CAST(loc.addr2 AS CHAR) AS addr2, CAST(loc.zipcode AS CHAR) AS zipcode, CAST(loc.firstImage AS CHAR) AS firstImage, CAST(loc.secondImage AS CHAR) AS secondImage, CAST(loc.sidoCode AS CHAR) AS sidoCode, CAST(loc.latitude AS CHAR) AS latitude, CAST(loc.longitude AS CHAR) AS longitude, CAST(loc.overview AS CHAR) AS overview, CAST(loc.contentTypeId AS CHAR) AS contentTypeId FROM ( SELECT COUNT(h.locationId) AS hits, l.locationId FROM location l JOIN hotplace h ON l.locationId = h.locationId GROUP BY l.locationId ) sub JOIN location loc ON loc.locationId = sub.locationId
